name: How to build a table in Atmosphere DS
description:
This is a guide on how to build a table using the Table Cell component available in the Atmosphere Design System Library. The guide will show you how to nest table cells in columns and columns in tables. Use auto layout and different types of resizing to get a fully responsive table.


You never have to detach the Table Cell component, and it's easy to manage.


Remix + guide:

The Table Cell components is a remix of the "One Mighty Table Cell" and adapted to fit the Atmosphere design system. The how to guide is added by us. Credit goes to: Masha
